original_title: สันดานกรุง
overview: Dararat, a documentary typewriter in a daily newspaper company in Bangkok. She recently knew that she was about to get fired with no reason. She decided to spy on a story of Night Cafe which had been investigating by a missing reporter. Dararat was going on this trail with a colleague at the same department , Silai. They both wanted to be back into their company of being a journalist but had no idea about the secret story.
title: Bangkok Tradition
